data.name: OWASP AppSec Day
data.description: AppSec Day is Australia’s biggest software security conference aimed at Developers, DevOps Engineers, Quality Assurance Testers and Security Professionals alike.

relatedRecords.name: Security, Identity, and Privacy Miniconf

relatedRecords.name: OWASP New Zealand Day - 2020
relatedRecords.description: We are proud to announce the eleventh OWASP New Zealand Day conference, to be held at the University of Auckland on Friday, February 21st, 2020. OWASP New Zealand Day is a one-day conference dedicated to information security, with an emphasis on secure architecture and development techniques to help…
